    • Method Detail

      • getEastNorthArea

        public static double getEastNorthArea(List<EdNode> nodes)
        Calculates approximate planar area determined by the given polygon, in east/north coordinates. Relies on current projection and works only for small areas. Use it only for relative comparisons of areas! Both closed and non-closed polygons are supported.
        Parameters:
        nodes - List of points defining the polygon
        Returns:
        Calculated area

      • unorientedAngleBetween

        public static double unorientedAngleBetween(EdNode p0,
                                            EdNode p1,
                                            EdNode p2)
        Calculates unoriented angle between two line segments, in radians. The angle is in range 0 .. PI.
        Parameters:
        p0 - First point of the first segment
        p1 - Vertex point, shared by both segments
        p2 - Second point of the second segment
        Returns:
        Angle in radians

      • unorientedAngleBetween

        public static double unorientedAngleBetween(Node p0,
                                            Node p1,
                                            Node p2)
        Calculates unoriented angle between two line segments, in radians. The angle is in range 0 .. PI.
        Parameters:
        p0 - First point of the first segment
        p1 - Vertex point, shared by both segments
        p2 - Second point of the second segment
        Returns:
        Angle in radians

      • distanceToSegmentMeters

        public static double distanceToSegmentMeters(EdNode point,
                                             EdNode segp1,
                                             EdNode segp2)
        Calculates distance of a point to a line segment. Distance is calculated as a great circle distance between point and the closest point within the line segment.
        Parameters:
        point - Point for which the minimal distance is calculated
        segp1 - First point determining the line segment
        segp2 - Second point determining the line segment
        Returns:
        Distance in meters

      • distanceToSegmentMeters

        public static double distanceToSegmentMeters(Node point,
                                             Node segp1,
                                             Node segp2)
        Calculates distance of a point to a line segment. Distance is calculated as a great circle distance between point and the closest point within the line segment.
        Parameters:
        point - Point for which the minimal distance is calculated
        segp1 - First point determining the line segment
        segp2 - Second point determining the line segment
        Returns:
        Distance in meters

      • pointDeviationFromSegment

        public static GeomDeviation pointDeviationFromSegment(EdNode point,
                                                      EdNode segp1,
                                                      EdNode segp2)
        Returns distance and angle deviations of a point from a line segment. Distance deviation is the minimal distance of the point to the line. Angle deviation is the greater of unoriented vertex angles (point, segp1, segp2) and (point, segp2, segp1).
        Parameters:
        point - Point for which the deviation is calculated
        segp1 - First point determining the line segment
        segp2 - Second point determining the line segment
        Returns:
        Calculated GeomDeviation

      • pointDeviationFromSegment

        public static GeomDeviation pointDeviationFromSegment(Node point,
                                                      Node segp1,
                                                      Node segp2)
        Returns distance and angle deviations of a point from a line segment. Distance deviation is the minimal distance of the point to the line. Angle deviation is the greater of unoriented vertex angles (point, segp1, segp2) and (point, segp2, segp1).
        Parameters:
        point - Point for which the deviation is calculated
        segp1 - First point determining the line segment
        segp2 - Second point determining the line segment
        Returns:
        Calculated GeomDeviation
